gameTexts.farmer2Outro: Mechanical seeder sows the seeds deep in soil to protect them from birds.
gameTexts.farmer3Outro: Manure provides all the essential nutrients to crops in one go.

steps.text: Farmers of this village are facing various challenges in their farming practices.
Help the farmers by providing appropriate solutions to their problems.
Tap on the farmer you wish to help.
This farmer wishes to plough his field while using the least amount of time and physical labour.

question.text: Choose the appropriate option for ploughing that can meet the farmer’s requirements.

feedBack.text: Correct! Ploughing the field using a tractor drawn plough saves time as well as physical labour.
Nope! Cattle drawn plough utilises a huge amount of energy and time as it is a completely manual method.

steps.text: The farmer is worried about birds eating the seeds he sprinkles.

question.text: Choose the suitable option to assist the farmer in saving his seeds from the birds.

feedBack.text: Great! Tractor drawn seeder sows the seeds at equal distances and deep into the soil, ensuring that they are safe from birds.
Uh-oh! Birds grow accustomed to the presence of scarecrows with time. Thus, it is not an efficient method of protecting the seeds.

steps.text: This farmer wishes to provide his plants with all the nutrients without having to spend a large sum of money.

question.text: Choose the suitable option that can meet the farmer’s requirements.

feedBack.text: Correct! With the use of manure, the farmer can provide the crops with all the nutrients at once.
As it is derived from natural sources and contains all the essential nutrients, the farmer won’t need to spend too much money.
Incorrect! A single bag of fertilizer cannot supply all the nutrients to the crops.
The farmer would have to purchase multiple fertilizers for different nutrients needed by the plants.

steps.text: The farmer wants a cost effective irrigation system.

question.text: Choose the correct option that can meet the farmer’s requirements.

feedBack.text: Great! Wells can be used to directly irrigate the field. It will be a cheaper alternative for the farmer.
In this method, water is taken directly from the well, with the help of a pulley and is used to irrigate the crops.
Nope! Irrigating the fields with sprinklers will not help the farmer as installing this system will be expensive.

steps.text: This farmer wants to harvest his crops, but he doesn't have enough time or workers to do so.

question.text: Choose the suitable option that can meet the farmer’s requirements.

feedBack.text: Correct! A tractor drawn harvester is used to harvest the crops using minimal amounts of manual labour and time.
Nope! When time and workers are limited, sickle cannot be used to harvest crops as it is an entirely manual process.

steps.text: Good Job! You have solved all of the farmers' concerns by providing a reasonable option.
